review.reviewBody: Amazing food! I have tried probably a hundred Chinese restaurants trying to find chow mein that is similar to one that I loved from a restaurant which closed years ago.  Finally a place that cooks it exactly how I like it! It is perfection !!!  We have tried a number of items off the menu and everything has been wonderful. Highly recommend this restaurant :)
a bit  salty with everything especially the brocoli in the rice noodle

Excellent taste on all.
I was quite surprised at the Very small portions, though.
$10, for 3 lousy, not even full size chicken feet. clearly a rip off
Mid at best. Item portions are tiny for the cost
